---
title: "Numerical approximation of fractional diffusion equations on metric graphs"
---

This website is a companion to the paper *Numerical approximation of fractional diffusion equations on metric graphs*, available on [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/0000.00000), by David Bolin, Lenin R. Riera-Segura, and Alexandre B. Simas.

Visit this [GitHub](https://github.com/leninrafaelrierasegura/NAFDEMG) repository for all the necessary files to reproduce the results presented in this website and paper.

Go to the [Contents](about.html) page for a brief description of the contents of this website.
